content.rendered:
MATTHEW PICCIUTO

Courtier hypothécaire /
Mortgage Broker

  • 514.947.4426
  • matthew.picciuto@vinegroup.ca
  • English, Français
  • Montréal

Matthew Picciuto is a highly accomplished professional with a strong educational background and a proven track record in the finance industry. He earned his degree in Economics B.A. and Business Studies from the esteemed John Molson School of Business at Concordia University.

Following his university studies, he ventured to Paris, where he gained valuable international experience working for ING for a year. In 2009, he made a significant move in his career by joining RBC, where he would achieve remarkable success.

Matthew consistently outperformed expectations throughout his tenure at RBC, earning the coveted title of Top Performer for nine consecutive years. This notable achievement is a testament to his dedication, expertise, and exceptional work ethic.

Matthew eagerly anticipates a new chapter in his professional journey as he looks forward to being one of the pioneering agents to establish Groups Vine Courtage Hypothécaire, Vine Group’s first Quebec mortgage brokerage. This exciting opportunity will allow him to cater to the Quebec market, bringing his wealth of experience and expertise to serve clients in the region. With his strong track record and unwavering commitment, he is well-equipped to significantly impact the expansion of Vine Group’s presence in Quebec.
